pages.title: On Death & Dying
pages.text: $(l)The good news:$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)You keep your equipment; no more grave runs to collect your gear$()$(br2)$(l)The bad news:$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)You lose all your bonus hearts from eating and of course most of your XP$()$(br2)

pages.title: Take good notes
pages.text: However; you can mitigate the problem of XP loss by taking good notes in an XP Tome$(br2)
